content: उदन् {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> (उद्-अन्) To breathe upwards, send out the breath in an upward direction (<ab>opp.</ab> अपान्).

उदन् {%<ab>n.</ab>%} [उंद्-कनिन्] Water (usually occurring in compounds either at the beginning or at the end, and as an optional substitute for उदक after the <ab>acc.</ab> dual. It has no forms for the first five inflections. In <ab>comp.</ab> it drops its न्); {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} उदधि, अच्छोद, क्षीरोद &c.
